mapper.sql: id, learn_date,begin_time, end_time,learn_content, learn_hours, `year`, `month`, `day`, week_day, update_time
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_learn_detail (learn_date,begin_time, end_time,learn_content, learn_hours, `year`, `month`, `day`, week_day) values
( #{item.learnDate},#{item.beginTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.learnContent}, #{item.learnHours},#{item.year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.day,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.weekDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(yearMonth) maxYearMonth,MIN(yearMonth) minYearMonth,MAX(YEAR) maxYear,MIN(YEAR) minYear FROM (SELECT YEAR*100+MONTH yearMonth,YEAR FROM tbl_learn_detail) t
select year,month,sum(learn_hours) learnHours from tbl_learn_detail where year = #{year} group by month
select year,sum(learn_hours) learnHours from tbl_learn_detail group by `year` order by year asc
select distinct learn_content from tbl_learn_detail order by learn_content
